name: SurvivingBug2.0
description:
Hey folks,

I made this game for Blackthornprod 3# GameJam.

I was to late. :'( Somhow i coudn't build the game and it took me some time to figure it out. 

But now here it is :D

Have Fun ;D

Credits:       The Birds: ma9ici4n.itch.io     https://ma9ici4n.itch.io/pixel-art-bird-16x16

                          Music: Purple Planet Music    Title: Love Life       https://www.purple-planet.com

Controlls:       Move with W, S and mouse 

                              You can restart your try with "R"

                              "Esc" brings you back in the MainMenu
